author: jstrachan
msg: Added setter method so that Ant Project's can be registered for a given context, allowing customized Ant Projects to be installed.

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied Stephen's patch that tests for non-String properties.

author: jstrachan
msg: New JellyUnit test case for the <define:dynabean/> tag

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for <define:dynabean/> that can bind a tag to a new DynaBean instance.

This is similar to the <define:bean/> mechanism but just the DynaBean alternative. It allows DynaClasses to be created using the <dynabean:dynaclass> tag then bound to an element in XML for easy population.
